Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Naboola mbu: “ bano nabakhana banje itse ebahelesie(mubateshie) toto enywe nimuli abakholanga
Nditsuba khulubaka lulwo, mbu : “abo bali mubumesi bwabu nibanyakhananga eshikhaya.”
Mana eshinyasio shioluyoka nishibabukula mumabwibwi
Mana nikhukhola hasi wabu okhuba hekulu, mana nikhubakwisilia ifula ya machina yeliloba lwomumulilo.”
Toto mu ako khulimwo nende ameeko khubandu baretsanga amakhuwa khushichelo
Ne toto tsingongo etso tsili khutsinjila tsiburungwakhwo
Toto mu ako khulimwo nende ameeko khubasuubili
Netoto Abandu bomushitsimi bali ababii
Mana nikhubahelesia eshinyasio, ne ebialo bibili bino bili khunjila ili habulafu
Netoto Abandu ba Hijri bayingasia Abarumwa
Ne nikhubahelesia abimanyisio biefu nabo nibalabukulamwo oluchendo tawe
Ne bakwotanga tsingulu nibakasia tsinzu
Mana eshinyasio shioluyoka nishibabukula mumabwibwi
Mana akabakholanga nikalabakhonyakhwo shiosi shiosi tawe
Ne shikhwalonga likulu nende eshialo nende ebili hakari wabio halali khubwatoto, ne toto indukho iliula , kho leshela okhuleshela okhulayi
Toto Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi niye omuloonji ne niye Omumanyi muno
Ne khwakhwelesia tsinyaali saba tsisomungwa ebise nebise nende Ikurani yoluyali
Ne olakhosia tsimoni tsitsio khukalia akakhwahelesia emikanda chindi hakari wabu, nohomba olababelelela tawe. Ne wishilie abasuubili olubaa lulwo. (lwetsimbabaasi)
Ne boolambu:“ toto esie nesie Omwikanyilisi Omwinoosi.(owahabulafu)
Shingala khweshilia balia (eshinyasio bosi) balia abekaba emikanda (okhwikalila abusalamu)
